# Module Assessments

For this module, complete and submit the following items for assessment.

## Quizzes

Obtain the quiz sheets for this module, fill them out and submit them before the due date. You can find the sheet(s) for this module and submission instructions in the _Course Resources_ section.


## Discussions 

Contribute to our weekly discussion as described in the _Exercises_ document of this module. Post your own and reply to others' posts.
